title: Nicky问题
author: winter645
txt_content:
我设置中文名之后这样子的：




QQ截图20180908170921.png (974 Bytes, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

问题
2018-9-8 17:11 上传






配置文件：
# Nicky Config - loyloy.io
# -
# nicky_prefix - Prefix for plugin messages.
# type - Storage type "sqlite" or "mysql"
# host/port/user/password/database - MySQL settings, not needed for SQLite
# tab - Should names in the tablist be updated?
# unique - Should all nicknames be unique?
# prefix - Add a prefix before nicknames? (Set to '' to disable)
# length - The max and min number of characters in a nickname, including color codes.
# characters - RegEx for characters allowed in a nickname, set to '' for any, or leave default for only letters and numbers.
# blacklist - Words that cannot appear in any nickname.
# -
nicky_prefix: '[Nicky]'
type: mysql
host: 10.86.3.51
port: '3306'
user: firadio_yishiyimeng_ysym
password: 63553448
database: firadio_yishiyimeng_ysym
tagapi: true
tab: true
unique: true
prefix: '&b#'
length: 20
min_length: 3
characters: ''
blacklist:
- Melonking
- Admin
复制代码

replies.author: schorsch
replies.txt_content: 数据库建立的时候是utf-8编码吗？

replies.author: North丶Kraken
replies.txt_content: 配置文件，转码，使用UTF-8格式

replies.author: winter645
replies.txt_content:
North丶Kraken 发表于 2018-9-8 17:29

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: nihongchun

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: schorsch
replies.txt_content:
备份 删库 重新建立数据库 character set 选utf8 collation 选uft_unicode_ci 

试过了吗？

replies.author: winter645
replies.txt_content:
schorsch 发表于 2018-9-9 10:36
备份 删库 重新建立数据库 character set 选utf8 collation 选uft_unicode_ci 

试过了吗？ ...
试过了，然而并没有卵用

replies.author: schorsch
replies.txt_content:
测试了一下。。
应该是插件本身不支持了

测试版本为spigot 1.12
插件版本为Nicky 0.6.9
下载地址 https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/nicky.590/
数据库为mysql 5.7.5
database 设置为character set 选utf8 collation 选uft_unicode_ci 

中文乱码
